body_html: Ah, there is a problem with this change. See the tests -- some initializers already take 3 arguments and don't want to work with 2. Do you think there is a work-around, or should we move everything to having 3 args? Take a look please, we cannot merge when tests are failing.
body_text: Ah, there is a problem with this change. See the tests -- some initializers already take 3 arguments and don't want to work with 2. Do you think there is a work-around, or should we move everything to having 3 args? Take a look please, we cannot merge when tests are failing.
body: Ah, there is a problem with this change. See the tests -- some initializers already take 3 arguments and don't want to work with 2. Do you think there is a work-around, or should we move everything to having 3 args? Take a look please, we cannot merge when tests are failing.
